issue.title: [CI][Crossbow] Nightly java docker job fails
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-6433](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-6433). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
See https://circleci.com/gh/ursa-labs/crossbow/2335. Either fix, skip job and create followup Jira to unskip, or delete job.
